User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Disallow admin and private areas
Disallow: /dashboard/
Disallow: /api/
Disallow: /admin/

# Allow important pages
Allow: /pricing
Allow: /quote
Allow: /contact
Allow: /login
Allow: /register
Allow: /kb

# Sitemap location
Sitemap: https://fixmy.site/sitemap.xml

# Crawl delay (optional)
Crawl-delay: 1
